name: bm-multi-acessos
description: Dashboard de Gerenciamento de AnÃºncios Facebook

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=development npm install && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && npm run compile:css
scripts.compile:css: sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/bm-facebook.css dist/css/bm-facebook.css && sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/adsets.css dist/css/adsets.css && sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/conjuntos-anuncios.css dist/css/conjuntos-anuncios.css && sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/contas-ads.css dist/css/contas-ads.css && sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/campanhas.css dist/css/campanhas.css && sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/overview.css dist/css/overview.css && sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/users.css dist/css/users.css && sass --style=compressed dashboard/admin/css/campaigns.css dist/css/campaigns.css
scripts.dev: npm run dev:css && npm run dev:js
